perturbation.original_text: All actions by each Party related to this Agreement will comply with applicable laws and regulations.
perturbation.changed_text: Each Party will endeavor to ensure that actions related to this Agreement are generally aligned with applicable laws and regulations.
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates strict compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. The modified text replaces 'will comply' with 'will endeavor to ensure...are generally aligned,' weakening the obligation. This introduces ambiguity as to the level of compliance required and what constitutes 'generally aligned.'
perturbation.contradicted_law: This could contradict various state and federal laws depending on the actions taken under the agreement. For example, if the actions involve environmental regulations, this could contradict the Clean Air Act or Clean Water Act, which require strict adherence to specific standards.
